text: Fahd Al Hayyan (born March 22, 1971) is a Saudi Arabian actor, who started his acting career in 1991. He is mostly known for his various roles in the Saudi comedy Ghashamsham and Tash ma Tash. == Acting works == *Tash ma Tash (for several years) *Ghashamsham During Ramadan (2006-2011) ==References == * == External links == *http://www.alriyadh.com/2007/02/01/article221244.html *http://www.alriyadh.com/2010/03/16/article506877.html *http://moh- alzela3e.com/vb/showthread.php?t=22032 Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian male television actors Category:People from Riyadh
title: Fahd Al-Hayyan
